CodeSourceItem.description: The code source configurations returned when the ListCodeSources API operation is called.

CodeSourceId.description: The ID of the code source.

DisplayName.description: The name of the code source.

Description.description: The description of the code source.

CodeRepo.description: The URL of the code repository.

CodeBranch.description: The branch of the code repository. If you configure this parameter when you call the CreateJob API operation, the branch is overwritten.

CodeCommit.description: The commit ID. If you configure this parameter when you call the CreateJob API operation, the commit is overwritten.

CodeRepoUserName.description: The username used to access the private code repository.

CodeRepoAccessToken.description: The access token used to access the code repository.

UserId.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud user who creates the code source.

GmtCreateTime.description: The time when the code source was created. The time is displayed in UTC.

GmtModifyTime.description: The time when the code source was modified. The time is displayed in UTC.

Image.description: The endpoint of the container image.

WorkingDir.description: The working directory in the container.

DataSourceItem.description: The information about the data source.

DataSourceType.description: The data source type. Only File Storage NAS (NAS) file systems are supported.

FileSystemId.description: The ID of the NAS file system. For more information, see [Alibaba Cloud documentation](~~185212~~).

Path.description: The path of the Alibaba Cloud Object Storage Service (OSS) file system.

Endpoint.description: The endpoint of the Alibaba Cloud OSS file system.

Options.description: The configuration options of the Alibaba Cloud OSS file system.

MountPath.description: The local path of the container that is attached to the runtime of the task.

UserId.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud account that creates the data source.

GmtCreateTime.description: The time when the data source was created. The time is displayed in UTC.

GmtModifyTime.description: The time when the data source was last modified. The time is displayed in UTC.

AcceleratorType.description:
The accelerator type. Valid values:

*   CPU
*   GPU

Memory.description: The memory size. Unit: MiB or GiB.

IsAvailable.description:
Indicates whether an instance type is available. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

ResourceType.description:
The resource type. Valid values:

*   ECS
*   Lingjun

SpotStockStatus.description: The inventory status of preemptible instances.

NonProtectSpotDiscount.description: The discount on the current price of the preemptible instance.

items.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

*   Spot
*   PostPaid

Name.description: The name of the environment variable.

Value.description: The value of the environment variable.

SharedVolumeMountPaths.description: The local paths shared between containers.

DockerRegistry.description: The address of the image repository.

Username.description: The username that is used to log on to the image repository.

Password.description: The password that is used to log on to the image repository.

Auth.description: The authentication information of the image repository.

ImageItem.description: The details of the docker image.

ImageTag.description: The tag of the docker image.

ImageUrlVpc.description: The VPC endpoint of the image URL. This address provides faster access speed.

ImageProviderType.description:
The image type. Valid values:

*   Community
*   PAI

AcceleratorType.description:
The type of the image accelerator. Valid values:

*   cpu
*   gpu

Framework.description:
The computing framework that is encapsulated by the image. Valid values:

*   TFJob
*   PyTorchJob

CredentialConfig.description: The credential configurations associated with the job.

JobType.description:
The job type. Valid values:

*   TFJob
*   PyTorchJob
*   MPIJob
*   XGBoostJob
*   OneFlowJob
*   ElasticBatchJob
*   RayJob
*   SlurmJob

SecurityGroupId.description: The ID of the security group.

ExtendedCidrs.description: The extended CIDR blocks that need to be connected.

DefaultRoute.description:
The default route. Valid values:

*   eth0: The default network interface is used to access the Internet through the public gateway.
*   eth1: The user's Elastic Network Interface is used to access the Internet through the private gateway.

UserId.description: The UID of the user to which the job belongs.

Username.description: The username that is used to submit the job.

Status.description:
The job status. Valid values:

*   Succeeded
*   Failed

WorkspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which the job belongs.

WorkspaceName.description: The name of the workspace to which the job belongs.

ResourceId.description: The ID of the resource group to which the resource belongs.

ResourceLevel.description: The resource level of the job run time.

ReasonCode.description:
The reason code for the job to enter the current status. Valid values:

*   InvalidParameter
*   JobSucceeded
*   JobStoppedByUser

ReasonMessage.description: The detailed reason for the job to enter the current status.

JobSpecs.description: The node configurations of the job run time.

UserCommand.description: The start command for each node of the job.

DataSources.description: A list of all data sources used by the job.

MountPath.description: The local mount path of the data source.

CodeSource.description: The code source used by the job.

Commit.description: The CommitID of the code repository used by the job.

MountPath.description: The local mount path of the code.

ThirdpartyLibs.description: The third-party Python libraries required for the job.

ThirdpartyLibDir.description: The name of the folder in which the requirements.txt file resides.

Envs.description: The environment variables that are injected into the job run time.

additionalProperties.description: The key and value of the environment variable.

GmtCreateTime.description: The time when the job was created (UTC).

GmtSubmittedTime.description: The time when the job was submitted (UTC).

GmtRunningTime.description: The time when the job started (UTC).

GmtSuccessedTime.description: The time when the job succeeded (UTC).

GmtStoppedTime.description: The time when the job stopped (UTC).

GmtFailedTime.description: The time when the job failed (UTC).

GmtFinishTime.description: The time when the job ended (UTC).

GmtModifiedTime.description: The time when the job was modified (UTC).

Duration.description: The duration of the job. Unit: seconds.

JobMaxRunningTimeMinutes.description: The maximum running duration of the job.

Settings.description: The extra parameters of the job.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the job is deleted.

ResourceName.description: The name of the resource on which the job runs.

ResourceQuotaName.description: The name of the resource quota.

SubStatus.description: The sub-status of the job, such as the preemption and retry status.

UseOversoldResource.description: Indicates whether the job uses idle resources.

ResourceType.description: The resource type. Valid values: ECS, Lingjun, and ACS.

StatusHistory.title: StatusHistory
StatusHistory.description: The status history of the job.

items.description: The historical status of the job.

ElasticSpec.description: The elastic parameters of the job.

BusinessUserId.description: The ID of the user associated with the job.

EnableTideResource.description:
Indicates whether tidal resources are allowed to be used by jobs. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

EnableErrorMonitoringInAIMaster.description:
Indicates whether the fault tolerance monitoring feature is enabled for the job. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

ErrorMonitoringArgs.description: The configuration parameters after you enable the fault tolerance monitoring feature. For example, you can specify whether to enable log hang-based detection.

EnableRDMA.description:
Indicates whether the RDMA feature is enabled for the job. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

EnableOssAppend.description:
Indicates whether data is written to Object Storage Service (OSS) in append mode. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

OversoldType.description: The way in which computing resources for off-peak hours are used for the job. Valid values: ForbiddenQuotaOverSold, AcceptQuotaOverSold, and ForceQuotaOverSold.

EnableSanityCheck.description:
Indicates whether the sanity check feature is enabled for the job. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

SanityCheckArgs.description: The configuration parameters for the sanity check feature.

JobReservedMinutes.description: The retention period after the job ends. Unit: minutes.

JobReservedPolicy.description: The retention policy after the job ends.

EnableCPUAffinity.description: Indicates whether the CPU affinity is enabled. This parameter takes effect only when you use subscription general computing resources.

DisableEcsStockCheck.description:
Indicates whether inventory check is skipped. Valid values:

*   true
*   false

JobSpec.title: JobSpec
JobSpec.description: The detailed configurations of a type of worker, including the hardware specifications, images that is run by the worker node, and number of replicas.

Type.description:
The worker type, which is closely related to JobType. The valid values of this parameter vary based on the value of JobType.

*   Valid values when JobType is set to **TFJob**: Chief, PS, Worker, Evaluator, and GraphLearn.
*   Valid values when JobType is set to **PyTorchJob**: Worker and Master.
*   Valid values when JobType is set to **XGBoostJob**: Worker and Master.
*   Valid values when JobType is set to **OneFlowJob**: Worker and Master.
*   Valid values when JobType is set to **ElasticBatch**: Worker and Master.

The Master node in jobs of the PyTorchJob, XGBoostJob, OneFlowJob, or ElasticBatch type is optional. If you do not specify the Master node, the system automatically uses the first Worker node as the Master node.

Image.description: The address of the image that is run by the worker node. You can call [ListImages](~~203133~~) to obtain the image provided by Platform for AI (PAI). You can also specify a third-party public image.

ImageConfig.description: The configuration of the private image.

EcsSpec.description:
The hardware specifications of the worker. For more information, see [Billing of DLC](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/171758.html?spm=a2c4g.11186623.6.557.61396005ZYTcba) of PAI.

>  The price varies based on instance specifications.

UseSpotInstance.description: Specifies whether to use preemptible instances.

SpotSpec.description: The configurations of the preemptible instance.

Value.description: The value of the monitoring data.

Message.description: The detailed information about the check results.

StartedAt.description: The time when the check starts.

FinishedAt.description: The time when the check ends.

CheckNumber.description: The nth time the check is performed.

SpotSpec.description: The configurations of the preemptible instance

SpotStrategy.description:
The spot policy. Valid values:

*   SpotWithPriceLimit

SpotDiscountLimit.description: The maximum discount. Specify only one of SpotDiscountLimit and SpotPriceLimit.

SpotPriceLimit.description: The maximum price. Unit: CNY/minute. Specify only one of SpotDiscountLimit and SpotPriceLimit.

RequestId.description: The request ID.

TensorboardDataSources.description: The mounted dataset for the TensorBoard job.

TensorboardSpec.description: The pay-as-you-go configurations for the TensorBoard job.

QuotaId.description: The resource group ID used by TensorBoard.

Priority.description: The priority of the TensorBoard job.

QuotaName.description: The name of the resource quota used by TensorBoard.

Options.description: The extended fields of the dataset are in the JSON format. mountpath: the path to mount the custom dataset.

TensorboardDataSourceSpec.description: The dataset configurations of the TensorBoard task.

DirectoryName.description: The directory prefix of the dataset in the TensorBoard task.

Name.description: The name of the dataset configurations. In most cases, the name of the dataset configurations is the name of a dataset or task.

Id.title: DataSource Id
Id.description: The ID of the dataset configurations. In most cases, the ID of the dataset configurations is the ID of a dataset or task.

DataSourceType.description: The file type that corresponds to the URI in the dataset configurations.

Uri.description: The file system URI in the dataset configurations.

SourceType.description:
The dataset type.

*   datasource: configure a dataset based on the dataset type.
*   dlcjob: configure a dataset based on the task type.

TensorboardSpec.description: The configurations of the pay-as-you-go Tensorboard task.

VpcId.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) configured for the pay-as-you-go Tensorboard task.

EcsType.description: The specifications of the ECS instance configured for the pay-as-you-go Tensorboard task.

SecurityGroupId.description: The ID of the security group configured for the pay-as-you-go Tensorboard task.

SwitchId.description: The ID of the vSwitch configured for the pay-as-you-go Tensorboard task.

CreateJob.summary: Creates a job that runs in a cluster. You can configure the data source, code source, startup command, and computing resources of each node on which a job runs.

schema.description: The request parameters.

DisplayName.title: 作业显示名称
DisplayName.description:
The job name. The name must be in the following format:

*   The name must be 1 to 256 characters in length.
*   The name can contain digits, letters, underscores (\_), periods (.), and hyphens (-).

JobType.title: 作业类型
JobType.description:
The job type. The value is case-sensitive. Valid values:

*   TFJob
*   PyTorchJob
*   MPIJob
*   XGBoostJob
*   OneFlowJob
*   ElasticBatchJob
*   SlurmJob
*   RayJob

Valid values for each job type:

*   OneFlowJob: OneFlow.
*   PyTorchJob: PyTorch.
*   SlurmJob: Slurm.
*   XGBoostJob: XGBoost.
*   ElasticBatchJob: ElasticBatch.
*   MPIJob: MPIJob.
*   TFJob: Tensorflow.
*   RayJob: Ray.

JobSpecs.title: 作业规格配置
JobSpecs.description:
The configurations for job running, such as the image address, startup command, node resource declaration, and number of replicas.****

A DLC job consists of different types of nodes. If nodes of the same type have exactly the same configuration, the configuration is called JobSpec. **JobSpecs** specifies the configurations of all types of nodes. The value is of the array type.

UserCommand.title: 作业命令
UserCommand.description: The startup command for all nodes of the job.

DataSources.title: 数据源配置列表
DataSources.description: The data sources for job running.

items.description:
The data source. The data source is mounted to the local path of the container in which each node resides based on the data source configuration. The local path is specified by the MountPath parameter in the data source configuration.

The process in the startup command of the job directly accesses the distributed file system that resides in the path specified by the MountPath parameter. Each data source is a distributed file system.

DataSourceId.title: 数据源Id
DataSourceId.description:
The data source ID. 
<props="china">For more information about how to obtain the ID of a data source, see [ListDatasets](~~457222~~).</props>

MountPath.title: 本地挂载路径
MountPath.description: The path to which the job is mounted. By default, the mount path in the data source configuration is used. This parameter is optional.

Options.description: The mount attribute of the custom dataset. Set the value to OSS.

CodeSource.title: 代码源配置
CodeSource.description: The code source of the job. Before the node of the job runs, DLC automatically downloads the configured code from the code source and mounts the code to the local path of the container.

CodeSourceId.title: 代码源Id
CodeSourceId.description:
The ID of the code source. 
<props="china">For more information about how to obtain the ID of a code source, see [ListCodeSources](~~459922~~).</props>

Branch.title: 代码分支
Branch.description: The branch of the referenced code repository. By default, the branch configured in the code source is used. This parameter is optional.

Commit.title: 代码Commit
Commit.description: The commit ID of the code to be downloaded. By default, the commit ID configured in the code source is used. This parameter is optional.

MountPath.title: 本地挂载路径
MountPath.description: The path to which the job is mounted. By default, the mount path configured in the data source is used. This parameter is optional.

SwitchId.title: 用户交换机的id
SwitchId.description:
The vSwitch ID. This parameter is optional.

*   If you leave this parameter empty, the system automatically selects a vSwitch based on the inventory status.
*   You can also specify a vSwitch ID.

SecurityGroupId.title: 用户安全组的id
SecurityGroupId.description: The ID of the security group.

ExtendedCIDRs.title: 扩展网段
ExtendedCIDRs.description:
The extended CIDR block.

*   If you leave the SwitchId and ExtendedCIDRs parameters empty, the system automatically obtains all CIDR blocks in a VPC.
*   If you configure the SwitchId and ExtendedCIDRs parameters, we recommend that you specify all CIDR blocks in a VPC.

DefaultRoute.description:
The default route. Valid values:

*   eth0: indicates that the default network interface controller (NIC) is used to access the external network through the public gateway.
*   eth1: indicates that the elastic network interface (ENI) is used to access the external network through the private gateway. For more information about the configuration method, see [Enable Internet access for a DSW instance by using a private Internet NAT gateway](~~2525343~~).

ThirdpartyLibs.title: 三方库配置列表
ThirdpartyLibs.description: The third-party Python libraries to be installed.

items.description: The third-party Python library and its version. Example: `numpy==1.16.1`.

ThirdpartyLibDir.title: 三方库(requirements.txt)文件路径
ThirdpartyLibDir.description: The folder in which the third-party Python library file requirements.txt is stored. Before the startup command specified by the UserCommand parameter is run on each node, DLC fetches the requirements.txt file from the folder and runs `pip install -r` to install the required package and library.

additionalProperties.description: The environment variable in the `Key=Value` format.

JobMaxRunningTimeMinutes.title: 作业最大运行时间
JobMaxRunningTimeMinutes.description: The maximum running duration of the job. Unit: minutes.

WorkspaceId.title: 工作空间编号
WorkspaceId.description:
The workspace ID. 
<props="china">For more information about how to obtain the ID of a workspace, see [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~).</props>

ResourceId.title: 资源组编号
ResourceId.description:
The ID of the resource group. This parameter is optional.

*   If you leave this parameter empty, the job is submitted to a public resource group.
*   If the workspace of the job is associated with a dedicated resource group, you can set the value to the ID of the dedicated resource group. For more information about how to create a dedicated resource group and query the ID of a dedicated resource group, see [Manage resource quotas](~~2651299~~).

Priority.title: 作业优先级
Priority.description:
The job priority. Valid values: 1 to 9. Default value: 1. This parameter is optional.

*   1: the lowest priority.
*   9: the highest priority.

Settings.description: The additional parameter configurations of the job.

Options.description: The additional configuration of the job. You can use this parameter to adjust the behavior of the attached data source. For example, if the attached data source of the job is of the OSS type, you can use this parameter to add the following configurations to override the default parameters of JindoFS: `fs.oss.download.thread.concurrency=4,fs.oss.download.queue.size=16`.

SuccessPolicy.description:
The policy that is used to check whether a distributed multi-node job is successful. Only TensorFlow distributed multi-node jobs are supported.

*   ChiefWorker: If you use this policy, the job is considered successful when the pod on the chief node completes operations.
*   AllWorkers (default): If you use this policy, the job is considered successful when all worker nodes complete operations.

Accessibility.description:
The job visibility. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The job is visible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The job is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

schema.description: The response parameters.

RequestId.title: 请求Id
RequestId.description: The request ID used to troubleshoot issues.

CreateJob.title: CreateJob
CreateJob.description: Before you call this operation, make sure that you understand the billing methods and [pricing](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/171758.html) of Deep Learning Containers (DLC) of Platform for AI (PAI).

DeleteJob.summary: Deletes a completed or stopped job.

schema.title: 作业Id
schema.description: The job ID. For more information about how to query the job ID, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

RequestId.title: 请求Id
RequestId.description: The request ID. You can troubleshoot issues based on the request ID.

DeleteJob.title: DeleteJob

UpdateJob.summary: Updates the configuration information of a job. For example, you can modify the priority of a job in a queue.

schema.title: 作业ID
schema.description: The job ID. For more information about how to obtain the ID of a job, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).
The job configurations.

Priority.title: 设置优先级
Priority.description:
The job priority. Valid values: 1 to 9.

*   1: the lowest priority.
*   9: the highest priority.

Accessibility.description:
The job visibility. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The job is visible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The job is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The returned data.

RequestId.title: 请求ID
RequestId.description: The request ID, which is used for diagnostics and Q\&A.

UpdateJob.title: UpdateJob

schema.title: 作业Id
schema.description: The job ID. For more information about how to query the job ID, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).
The returned data.

RequestId.title: 请求Id
RequestId.description: The request ID. You can troubleshoot issues based on the request ID.

ListJobs.summary: Queries a list of jobs and supports pagination, sorting, and filtering by conditions.

schema.title: 作业显示名称，支持模糊查询
schema.description: The job name. Fuzzy query is supported. The name is case-insensitive. Wildcards are not supported. For example, if you enter test, test-job1, job-test, job-test2, or job-test can be matched, and job-t1 cannot be matched. The default value null indicates any job name.

schema.title: 作业类型
schema.description:
The job type. You can query any job type. The default value null indicates any job type. Valid values:

*   TFJob
*   PyTorchJob
*   XGBoostJob
*   OneFlowJob
*   ElasticBatchJob

schema.title: 作业状态
schema.description:
The job status. Valid values:

*   Creating
*   Queuing
*   Bidding (only available for spot jobs that use Lingjun resources)
*   EnvPreparing
*   SanityChecking
*   Running
*   Restarting
*   Stopping
*   SucceededReserving
*   FailedReserving
*   Succeeded
*   Failed
*   Stopped

schema.title: 起始时间
schema.description: The start time of the query. Use the job creation time to filter data. The default value is the current time minus seven days. In other words, if you do not configure the StartTime and EndTime parameters, the system queries the job list in the last seven days.

schema.title: 截止时间
schema.description: The end time of the query. Use the job creation time to filter data. The default value is the current time.

schema.title: 当前页
schema.description: The number of the page to return for the current query. Minimum value: 1. Default value: 1.

schema.title: 每页返回的作业数
schema.description: The number of entries per page.

schema.title: 按返回字段排序
schema.description:
The sorting field in the returned job list. Valid values:

*   DisplayName
*   JobType
*   Status
*   GmtCreateTime
*   GmtFinishTime

schema.title: 排序顺序
schema.description:
The sorting order. Valid values:

*   desc (default)
*   asc

schema.title: 是否只返回当前登录者所提交的作业
schema.description: Specifies whether to query only the jobs submitted by the current user.

schema.title: 工作空间ID
schema.description:
The workspace ID. 
<props="china">For more information about how to obtain the ID of a workspace, see [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~).</props>

schema.title: 资源组ID
schema.description: The ID of the resource group. For information about how to obtain the ID of a dedicated resource group, see [Manage resource quotas](~~2651299~~).

schema.title: 作业关联用户ID
schema.description: The ID of the user associated with the job.

schema.title: 调用方
schema.description: The caller.

schema.title: 自定义标签
schema.description: The tags.

schema.title: 工作流ID
schema.description: The specific pipeline ID used to filter jobs.

Specifies whether to query a list of jobs across workspaces. This parameter must be used together with `ShowOwn=true`. You can use this parameter to query a list of jobs recently submitted by the current user.
The job ID. Fuzzy query is supported. The name is case-insensitive. Wildcards are not supported. The default value null indicates any job ID.

schema.title: 用于过滤的用户ID
schema.description: The user ID used to filter jobs.

schema.title: 提交作业用户名，支持模糊匹配
schema.description: The username used to filter jobs. Fuzzy search is supported. Wildcards are not supported. The default value null indicates that jobs are not filtered by username.

schema.title: 资源组名称
schema.description: The resource quota name used to filter jobs. Fuzzy search is supported. Wildcards are not supported. The default value null indicates that jobs are not filtered by resource quota name.

The job visibility. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The job is visible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The job is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

The Idle resource information. Valid values:

*   ForbiddenQuotaOverSold
*   ForceQuotaOverSold
*   AcceptQuotaOverSold-true (true indicates that the job uses idle resources.)
*   AcceptQuotaOverSold-false (false indicates that the job uses guaranteed resources.)
The response parameters.

TotalCount.title: 符合过滤条件的总作业数
TotalCount.description: The total number of jobs that meet the filter conditions.

RequestId.title: 请求Id
RequestId.description: The request ID used to troubleshoot issues.

ListJobs.title: ListJobs

GetJob.summary: Obtains the configuration and runtime information of a job.

schema.title: 作业Id
schema.description: The job ID. Call [ListJobs](~~459676~~) to get the job ID.

schema.title: 是否返回作业详情信息，默认为true
schema.description: Specifies whether to return the job details. Default value: true.
A JSON string.

JobType.title: 作业类型
JobType.description: The job type. Specified by the JobType parameter of the [CreateJob](~~459672~~) operation.

UserId.title: 作业提交人Id
UserId.description: The UID of the Alibaba Cloud account who submitted the job.

Status.title: 作业状态
Status.description:
The status of the job. Valid values:

*   Creating
*   Queuing
*   Bidding (Only for Lingjun preemptible jobs)
*   EnvPreparing
*   SanityChecking
*   Running
*   Restarting
*   Stopping
*   SucceededReserving
*   FailedReserving
*   Succeeded
*   Failed
*   Stopped

WorkspaceId.title: 作业所属工作空间ID
WorkspaceId.description: The ID of the workspace to which the job belongs.

WorkspaceName.title: 作业所属工作空间名称
WorkspaceName.description: The name of the workspace to which the job belongs.

ResourceId.title: 作业运行所在的资源组ID
ResourceId.description: The ID of the resource group to which the job belongs.

ResourceLevel.title: 作业运行时使用的资源级别
ResourceLevel.description: The resource level that the job uses.

ReasonCode.title: 状态详情码
ReasonCode.description: The status detail code, which is a sub-status under the current status.

ReasonMessage.title: 状态详情
ReasonMessage.description: The description of the status detail code.

JobSpecs.title: 作业规格配置
JobSpecs.description: The node configurations of the job, which is **JobSpecs** in the CreateJob operation.

items.description: The configurations of a node type.

UserCommand.title: 用户命令
UserCommand.description: The command that is run to start each node.

MountPath.title: 本地挂载路径
MountPath.description: The local mount path. This parameter is optional. The default value is empty, which specifies that the mount path in the data source is used.

ThirdpartyLibs.title: 三方库配置列表
ThirdpartyLibs.description: The third-party Python libraries to be installed.

additionalProperties.description: The key and value of the environment variable.

DefaultRoute.title:
默认路由。此参数只在通用计算资源下有效，取值如下：

eth0：表示使用默认网卡，通过公共网关访问外部网络。
eth1：表示使用用户弹性网卡，通过私有网关访问外部网络。
DefaultRoute.description:
The default router. This parameter is valid only for general-purpose computing resources. Valid values:

eth0: The default network interface is used to access the Internet through the public gateway. eth1: The user's Elastic Network Interface is used to access the Internet through the private gateway.

GmtCreateTime.title: 作业创建时间（UTC）
GmtCreateTime.description: The time when the job was created (UTC).

GmtSubmittedTime.description: The time when the job was submitted to the cluster (UTC).

GmtRunningTime.description: The start time of the job (UTC).

GmtSuccessedTime.description: The time when the job succeeded (UTC).

GmtStoppedTime.description: The time when the job stopped (UTC).

GmtFailedTime.description: The time of the job failed (UTC).

GmtFinishTime.title: 作业结束时间（UTC）
GmtFinishTime.description: The time when the job ended (UTC).

Pods.title: 作业所以运行Pod列表
Pods.description: All running nodes of the job.

Type.title: Pod类型
Type.description: The node type, which corresponds to a specific JobSpec in JobSpecs of the CreateJob operation.

PodId.title: Pod Id
PodId.description: The node ID. It can be used in the GetPodLogs and GetPodEvents operations to obtain the detailed logs and events of the node.

Status.title: Pod状态
Status.description:
The status of the node. Valid values:

*   Pending
*   Running
*   Succeeded
*   Failed
*   Unknown

Ip.title: Pod Ip
Ip.description: The IP address of the node.

GmtCreateTime.title: Pod创建时间（UTC）
GmtCreateTime.description: The time when the node was created (UTC).

GmtStartTime.title: Pod启动时间（UTC）
GmtStartTime.description: The start time of the node (UTC).

GmtFinishTime.title: Pod结束时间（UTC）
GmtFinishTime.description: The end time of the node (UTC).

Ip.title: Pod Ip
Ip.description: The IP address of the node.

GmtCreateTime.title: Pod创建时间（UTC）
GmtCreateTime.description: The time when the node was created (UTC).

GmtStartTime.title: Pod启动时间（UTC）
GmtStartTime.description: The start time of the node (UTC).

GmtFinishTime.title: Pod结束时间（UTC）
GmtFinishTime.description: The end time of the node (UTC).

SubStatus.title: Pod子状态，如抢占状态
SubStatus.description:
The sub-status of the node, such as its preemption status. Valid values:

*   Normal
*   Evicted

ResourceType.title: Pod资源使用类型
ResourceType.description: The resource type of the node.

SubStatus.title: Pod子状态，如抢占状态
SubStatus.description:
The sub-status of the node, such as its preemption status. Valid values:

*   Normal
*   Evicted

ResourceType.title: Pod资源使用类型
ResourceType.description: The resource type of the node.

RequestId.title: 请求Id
RequestId.description: The request ID, which can be used for troubleshooting.

Settings.title: 作业额外参数配置
Settings.description: The settings of the additional parameters of the job.

EnabledDebugger.title: 是否开启debugger任务
EnabledDebugger.description: Specifies whether to enable the debugger job.

Priority.title: 任务的优先级
Priority.description: The priority of the job. Valid values: 1 to 9.

SubStatus.title: 作业子状态，如抢占重试状态
SubStatus.description: The sub-status of the job, such as its preemption status.

RestartTimes.title: 作业已使用的重试次数和最大重试次数
RestartTimes.description: The number of retries and the maximum number of retries used by the job.

ResourceType.title: 资源类型，可选值：ECS，Lingjun，ACS
ResourceType.description: The resource type. Valid values: ECS, Lingjun, and ACS.

Accessibility.description:
The visibility of the job. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The code is public in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The workspace is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace. This is the default value.

GetJob.title: GetJob

GetJobSanityCheckResult.summary: Obtains specified job sanity check result in a Deep Learning Containers (DLC) job.

schema.description: The job ID. For more information about how to obtain a job ID, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).
The nth time for which the job sanity check is performed.

The phase in which the job sanity check is performed.

*   CheckInit
*   DeviceCheck
*   SingleNodeCommCheck
*   TwoNodeCommCheck
*   AllNodeCommCheck
The token information for job sharing. For more information about how to obtain the token information, see [GetToken](~~2557812~~).

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The specified job sanity check result.

items.description:
The phase in which the job sanity check is performed. Valid values:

*   Phase
*   Message
*   StartedAt
*   FinishedAt
*   Status
*   CheckNumber

GetJobSanityCheckResult.title: GetJobSanityCheckResult

ListJobSanityCheckResults.summary: Obtains the results of all sanity checks for a DLC job.

schema.description: The job ID. Call [ListJobs](~~459676~~) to get the job ID.

The sorting order:

*   desc: descending order
*   asc: ascending order

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The results of all sanity checks for a DLC job.

items.description:
The sanity check result of a check phase. Valid values:

*   Phase: the check phase
*   Message: the check result message
*   StartedAt: the start time of the check
*   FinishedAt: the end time of the check
*   Status: the check status
*   CheckNumber: the sequence number of the check

TotalCount.description: The total number of results that meet the filter conditions.

ListJobSanityCheckResults.title: ListJobSanityCheckResults

GetPodLogs.summary: Obtains or downloads the logs of a node for a task. The logs are from the stdout and stderr of the system and user scripts.

schema.title: 作业ID
schema.description: The job ID. For more information about how to obtain a job ID, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

schema.title: 实例ID
schema.description: The node ID. For more information about how to obtain a node ID, see [GetJob](~~459677~~).
The node UID. For more information about how to obtain a node UID, see [GetJob](~~459677~~).

schema.title: 返回的日志的最大行数，默认值：2000。
schema.description: The maximum number of log entries. Default value: 2000.

schema.title: 查询的起始时间，默认值：7天前。
schema.description: The start time of the query. Default value: 7 days ago.

schema.title: 查询的截止时间，默认值：当前。
schema.description: The end time of the query. Default value: current time.

schema.title: 是否下载日志文件，默认：false。
schema.description:
Specifies whether to download the log file. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   false
*   true

schema.title: 返回值
schema.description: The data returned.

RequestId.title: 请求ID
RequestId.description: The request ID which is used for diagnostics and Q\&A.

GetPodLogs.title: GetPodLogs

GetPodEvents.summary: Obtains the system events of a specific node in a job to locate and troubleshoot issues.

schema.title: 作业ID
schema.description: The job ID. Call [ListJobs](~~459676~~) to get the job ID.

schema.title: 运行实例ID
schema.description: The node ID. Call [GetJob](~~459677~~) to get the node ID.

schema.title: 运行实例UID
schema.description: The node UID. Call [GetJob](~~459677~~) to get the node UID.

schema.title: 返回的事件最大数量
schema.description: The maximum number of events that can be returned.

schema.title: 起始时间
schema.description: The start time (UTC).

schema.title: 截止时间
schema.description: The end time (UTC).

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The details of the job event.

RequestId.title: 请求ID
RequestId.description: The request ID, which can be used for troubleshooting.

GetPodEvents.title: GetPodEvents

GetJobMetrics.summary: Obtains the monitoring data of a job, including the CPU, GPU, and memory utilization, network, and disk read/write rate.

schema.title: 作业ID
schema.description: The job ID. You can call the [ListJobs](~~459676~~) operation to query all job IDs.

schema.title: 起始时间
schema.description: The beginning of the time range to query monitoring data. The time is displayed in UTC. The default value is the time 1 hour before the current time.

schema.title: 截止时间
schema.description: The end time of the time range to query monitoring data. The time is displayed in UTC. The default value is the current time.

schema.title: 时间间隔
schema.description: The interval at which monitoring data is returned. Default value: 5. Unit: minutes.

schema.title: 指标类型
schema.description:
The type of the monitoring metrics. Valid values:

*   GpuCoreUsage: GPU utilization
*   GpuMemoryUsage: GPU memory utilization
*   CpuCoreUsage: CPU utilization
*   MemoryUsage: memory utilization
*   NetworkInputRate: the network write in rate.
*   NetworkOutputRate: the network write out rate
*   DiskReadRate: the disk read rate
*   DiskWriteRate: the disk write rate

schema.title: Token
schema.description: The temporary token used for authentication.

schema.title: 作业监控指标
schema.description: The monitoring data of the job.

PodMetrics.title: 任务监控指标序列集合
PodMetrics.description: The monitoring metrics of the job.

items.description: The monitoring metric of the job.

RequestId.title: 请求ID
RequestId.description: The request ID. You can troubleshoot issues based on the request ID.

GetJobMetrics.title: GetJobMetrics

GetJobEvents.summary: Obtains the system events of a job.

schema.title: 作业ID
schema.description: The job ID. Call [ListJobs](~~459676~~) to get the job ID.

schema.title: 获取事件的最大数目，默认值：2000
schema.description: The maximum number of events that can be returned. Default value: 2000.

schema.title: 查询事件的时间区间的起始时间，默认值是7天前。
schema.description: The start time (UTC) of the time range for querying events. The default value is 7 days ago.

schema.title: 查询事件的时间区间的截止时间，默认值是当前。
schema.description: The end time (UTC) of the time range for querying events. The default value is the current time.
The details of the returned system events.

RequestId.title: 请求ID
RequestId.description: The request ID, which can be used for troubleshooting.

GetJobEvents.title: GetJobEvents

schema.title: 按加速器类型过滤
schema.description:
Filter by accelerator type. Valid values:

*   CPU
*   GPU

schema.title: 按返回字段排序，可选值：Cpu, Gpu, Memory, InstanceType, ResourceType, GpuType, AcceleratorType
schema.description:
The field based on which the results are sorted. Valid values:

*   CPU
*   GPU

schema.title: 排序顺序，可选值：desc, asc
schema.description:
The sorting order. Valid values:

*   desc: descending order.
*   asc: ascending order.

schema.title: 查询第几页数据
schema.description: The number of the page to query. The start value is 1.

schema.title: 设置查询的分页大写
schema.description: The number of entries returned per page.

schema.title: 需要查询机器规格列表，以逗号分隔
schema.description: The instance types to query. Separate the types with commas (,).

schema.title: 资源类型，可选值：ECS、Lingjun
schema.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   ECS
*   Lingjun

GetWebTerminal.summary: Provides methods and steps to obtain a HTTP link for accessing a container.

schema.description: The task ID.
The ID of the pod in the task.
The pod UID.

Specifies whether to create a shareable link to access the container. Valid values:

*   true: returns a shareable link to access the container. The link will expire after 30 seconds and can only be used once. After you access the container by using the link, other requests that use this link to access the container become invalid.
*   false: returns a common shareable link to access the container. If you use a common shareable link to access a container, Alibaba Cloud identity authentication is required. The link will expire after 30 seconds.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The returned data.

RequestId.description: The request ID which is used for diagnostics and Q\&A.

GetWebTerminal.title: GetWebTerminal

schema.title: TargetType
schema.description: The type of the job that you want to share. Valid values: job and tensorboard.

schema.title: TargetId
schema.description: The ID of the job that is waiting to be shared.

schema.title: ExpireTime
schema.description: The time when the share link expires. Default value: 604800 seconds. Minimum value: 0.

RequestId.title: RequestId
RequestId.description: The request ID, which is used to troubleshoot issues.

Token.title: Token
Token.description: The token of the shared job, which can be used as the value of the Token parameter in the GetJob API operation to view information about the shared job.

CreateTensorboard.summary: Creates a TensorBoard by using a job or specifying a data source configuration.

schema.description: The request parameters.

WorkspaceId.description:
The workspace ID. 
<props="china">Call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.</props>

JobId.title: 任务Id
JobId.description: The job ID. Call [ListJobs](~~459676~~) to get the job ID.

DataSourceId.title: DataSource Id
DataSourceId.description:
The dataset ID. 
<props="china">Call [ListDatasets](~~457222~~) to get the dataset ID.</props>

DataSourceType.description:
The dataset type. Valid values:

*   OSS
*   NAS

Uri.description:
The dataset URI.

*   Value format when DataSourceType is set to OSS: `oss://[oss-bucket].[endpoint]/[path]`.
*   Value format when DataSourceType is set to NAS:`nas://[nas-filesystem-id].[region]/[path]`.

Options.description: The extended fields of the dataset are in the JSON format. MountPath: the path to mount the dataset.

MaxRunningTimeMinutes.title: 最长运行时长
MaxRunningTimeMinutes.description: The maximum running duration. Unit: minutes.

DataSources.description: The configurations of the data source.

items.description: The information about the data source.

TensorboardDataSources.description: The configurations of datasets mounted with the TensorBoard job.

items.description: The TensorBoard dataset configuration information, which is used to mount multiple datasets. Currently, configuration by dataset (datasource) and configuration by job (dlc) are supported. When this parameter is not empty, the DataSourceId, Uri, and DataSourceType parameters do not take effect.

TensorboardSpec.description: The pay-as-you-go configuration of TensorBoard, which is used to create TensorBoard jobs that use pay-as-you-go resources.

QuotaId.description:
The resource quota ID. This parameter is required when you create a TensorBoard job by using a resource quota. <props="china">Call [ListQuotas](~~2628071~~) to get the quota ID. </props>
This feature is currently limited to whitelisted users. If you need to use this feature, contact us.

Priority.description:
The priority of the job. Default value: 1. Valid values: 1 to 9.

*   1 is the lowest priority.
*   9 is the highest priority.

Accessibility.description:
The visibility of the job. Valid values:

*   PUBLIC: The configuration is public in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: The configuration is visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.

RequestId.title: 请求Id
RequestId.description: The ID of the request.

CreateTensorboard.title: CreateTensorboard

ListTensorboards.summary: Queries a list of TensorBoard instances.

schema.title: 是否显示详情
schema.description:
Specifies whether to return the information about the TensorBoard instance.

*   true
*   false

schema.title: 工作空间ID
schema.description:
The workspace ID. Obtain a list of TensorBoard instances based on the workspace ID. 
<props="china">For more information, see [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~).</props>
The data source associated with the TensorBoard instance. This parameter is no longer used. Only Deep Learning Containers (DLC) training jobs are supported.
The data source ID. For more information about how to obtain the ID of a job, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

schema.title: 展示名称
schema.description: The TensorBoard instance name.

schema.title: 根据状态过滤
schema.description:
The TensorBoard instance status. Valid values:

*   Creating
*   Running
*   Stopped
*   Succeeded
*   Failed

schema.title: 起始时间
schema.description: The start time of the query. Use the UTC time when the TensorBoard instance is created to filter data. If you leave this parameter empty, the default value is seven days before the current time.

schema.title: 截止时间
schema.description: The end time of the query. Use the UTC time when the TensorBoard instance is created to filter data. If you leave this parameter empty, the default value is the current time.

schema.title: 按返回字段排序
schema.description:
The returned field used to sort TensorBoard instances.

*   DisplayName: the name of the TensorBoard instance.
*   GmtCreateTime: the time when the TensorBoard instance is created.

schema.title: 当前页
schema.description: The page number. Minimum value: 1.

schema.title: 每页返回的作业数
schema.description: The number of TensorBoard instances per page.

schema.title: 排序顺序
schema.description:
The sorting order.

*   desc
*   asc

schema.title: JobId
schema.description: The job ID used to filter TensorBoard instances. For more information about how to obtain the ID of a job, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

schema.title: TensorboardId
schema.description: The TensorBoard instance ID used to filter TensorBoard instances.

schema.title: 是否只返回当前登录者所创建的Tensorboard
schema.description: Specifies whether to return only the TensorBoard instances created by the current logon account.

The billing method of TensorBoard instances.

*   Free: the TensorBoard instance that uses free resources.
*   Postpaid: the TensorBoard instance that uses pay-as-you-go resources.
The user ID.
The username.

The resource quota ID.

> 

*   Only whitelisted users can use resource quotas to create TensorBoard instances. If you want to use this feature, contact us.

*   This parameter takes effect only when TensorBoard instances use resource quotas.

The instance visibility.

*   PUBLIC: TensorBoard instances are visible to all members in the workspace.
*   PRIVATE: TensorBoard instances are visible only to you and the administrator of the workspace.
The returned data.

items.description: The information about the TensorBoard instance.

TotalCount.title: 符合条件的数据源总数量
TotalCount.description: The total number of data sources that meet the conditions.

RequestId.title: 请求Id
RequestId.description: The request ID.

schema.title: 工作空间ID
schema.description:
The workspace ID. 
<props="china">For more information about how to query the workspace ID, see [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~).</props>

schema.title: TensorboardId Id
schema.description: The ID of the TensorBoard instance. For more information about how to obtain the ID of the TensorBoard instance, see [ListTensorboards](~~459689~~).

schema.title: JodId
schema.description: The job ID. For more information about how to query the job ID, see [ListJob](~~459676~~).

The information about the shared token. You can specify this parameter to obtain the permission to view a TensorBoard job based on the shared token information. You can execute [GetTensorboardSharedUrl](~~2557813~~) and extract the shared token from the obtained information.
The details of the TensorBoard instance.

GetTensorboardSharedUrl.summary: Obtains the shareable link of a TensorBoard task. The link contains digital tokens. You can use a shareable link to access a TensorBoard task.

schema.description: The ID of the TensorBoard task.
The validity period of the shareable link. Unit: seconds. Maximum value: 604800.

schema.title: Schema of Response
schema.description: The response parameters.
